## ToolboxCategory.setDisabled() method

Sets whether the category is disabled.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setDisabled(isDisabled: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  isDisabled | boolean | True to disable the category, false otherwise. |

**Returns:**

void
